<h3>Beef-Wellington</h3>
![](https://s3.amazonaws.com/finecooking.s3.tauntonclud.com/app/uploads/2000/12/19164801/beef-wellington_wide.jpg)
<dl>
  <dt>__INGREDIENTS__</dt>
    <dd>3 packages (1 lb. each) frozen puff pastry</dd>
    <dd>2 large portabella mushrooms, stems removed</dd>
    <dd>6 Tbs. olive oil; more for cooking</dd>
    <dd>1/2 tsp. fresh thyme leaves, lightly chopped</dd>
    <dd>1/2 tsp. very roughly chopped fresh rosemary</dd>
    <dd>Coarse salt and freshly ground black pepper</dd>
</dl>
<p> Complete ingredients and recipe instructions: <a href="https://www.finecooking.com/recipe/individual-beef-wellingtons-with-mushroom-spinach-blue-cheese-filling" target="_blank"> www.finecooking.com</a></p>
